text:
e="preserve">Dolores Caballero Abril (9 May 1939 – 25 October 2020) was a Spanish singer and actress. She was born in Hellín, Spain. Her music was generally Copla. She starred in "El emigrante" (1960).
From 1981 to 2004, she was married to Juanito Valderrama.
Abril died on 25 October 2020 in Seville, Spain at the age of 81.
